import React,{useRef,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AlchemyFlask=_ref=>{let{liquidColor='#4A90E2',temperature=20,isHeating=false,liquidLevel=0.7,bubbleIntensity=0}=_ref;const bubbleCanvasRef=useRef(null);const particleCanvasRef=useRef(null);const bubblesRef=useRef([]);const particlesRef=useRef([]);const animationRef=useRef(null);// Bubble System
useEffect(()=>{const canvas=bubbleCanvasRef.current;if(!canvas)return;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');const rect=canvas.getBoundingClientRect();const dpr=window.devicePixelRatio||1;canvas.width=200*dpr;canvas.height=300*dpr;canvas.style.width='200px';canvas.style.height='300px';ctx.scale(dpr,dpr);// –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë–º –ø—É–∑—ã—Ä–∏
const createBubbles=()=>{bubblesRef.current=[];const bubbleCount=Math.floor(bubbleIntensity*15);for(let i=0;i<bubbleCount;i++){bubblesRef.current.push({x:Math.random()*160+20,// –í–Ω—É—Ç—Ä–∏ –∫–æ–ª–±—ã
y:300-liquidLevel*200+Math.random()*50,radius:Math.random()*6+2,speed:Math.random()*1.5+0.5,opacity:Math.random()*0.6+0.4,wobble:Math.random()*Math.PI*2});}};const drawBubble=bubble=>{const gradient=ctx.createRadialGradient(bubble.x,bubble.y,1,bubble.x+2,bubble.y+2,bubble.radius);gradient.addColorStop(0,"rgba(255,255,255,".concat(bubble.opacity,")"));gradient.addColorStop(1,"rgba(173,216,230,0.1)");ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(bubble.x,bubble.y,bubble.radius,0,Math.PI*2);ctx.fillStyle=gradient;ctx.fill();};const animate=()=>{ctx.clearRect(0,0,200,300);bubblesRef.current.forEach((bubble,index)=>{bubble.y-=bubble.speed;bubble.x+=Math.sin(bubble.wobble+bubble.y*0.01)*0.3;bubble.wobble+=0.02;// –ï—Å–ª–∏ –ø—É–∑—ã—Ä—å –≤—ã—à–µ–ª –∑–∞ –≥—Ä–∞–Ω–∏—Ü—ã –∂–∏–¥–∫–æ—Å—Ç–∏
const liquidTop=300-liquidLevel*200;if(bubble.y<liquidTop){bubble.y=300-liquidLevel*200+Math.random()*20;bubble.x=Math.random()*160+20;}drawBubble(bubble);});animationRef.current=requestAnimationFrame(animate);};createBubbles();animate();return()=>{if(animationRef.current){cancelAnimationFrame(animationRef.current);}};},[bubbleIntensity,liquidLevel]);// –°–æ–∑–¥–∞–Ω–∏–µ —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—Ü –ø—Ä–∏ –¥–æ–±–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–∏ –∏–Ω–≥—Ä–µ–¥–∏–µ–Ω—Ç–∞
const createIngredientParticles=color=>{const canvas=particleCanvasRef.current;if(!canvas)return;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');const particles=[];// –°–æ–∑–¥–∞—ë–º —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏—Ü—ã –≤ —Ü–µ–Ω—Ç—Ä–µ –∫–æ–ª–±—ã
for(let i=0;i<25;i++){particles.push({x:100+(Math.random()-0.5)*40,y:150+(Math.random()-0.5)*40,vx:(Math.random()-0.5)*8,vy:(Math.random()-0.5)*8,color:color,life:1.0,decay:0.015,radius:Math.random()*3+1});}const animateParticles=()=>{ctx.clearRect(0,0,200,300);particles.forEach((particle,index)=>{particle.x+=particle.vx;particle.y+=particle.vy;particle.life-=particle.decay;particle.vx*=0.98;// –ó–∞—Ç—É—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∫–æ—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–∏
particle.vy*=0.98;ctx.save();ctx.globalAlpha=particle.life;ctx.fillStyle=particle.color;ctx.beginPath();ctx.arc(particle.x,particle.y,particle.radius,0,Math.PI*2);ctx.fill();ctx.restore();if(particle.life<=0){particles.splice(index,1);}});if(particles.length>0){requestAnimationFrame(animateParticles);}};animateParticles();};// –≠–∫—Å–ø–æ—Ä—Ç–∏—Ä—É–µ–º —Ñ—É–Ω–∫—Ü–∏—é –¥–ª—è –≤–Ω–µ—à–Ω–µ–≥–æ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è
useEffect(()=>{if(window.alchemyFlask){window.alchemyFlask.createParticles=createIngredientParticles;}else{window.alchemyFlask={createParticles:createIngredientParticles};}},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alchemy-flask-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"alchemy-flask",style:{filter:isHeating?'drop-shadow(0 0 20px rgba(255, 100, 100, 0.6))':'none'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"liquid",style:{background:"linear-gradient(45deg, ".concat(liquidColor,", ").concat(liquidColor,"dd, ").concat(liquidColor,"aa)"),height:"".concat(liquidLevel*70,"%"),animation:isHeating?'liquidBubble 1s ease-in-out infinite':'none'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:bubbleCanvasRef,className:"bubble-canvas",style:{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,pointerEvents:'none',zIndex:2}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:particleCanvasRef,width:"200",height:"300",className:"particle-canvas",style:{position:'absolute',top:0,left:0,pointerEvents:'none',zIndex:3}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flask-shine"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"temperature-indicator",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"temp-gauge",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"temp-mercury",style:{height:"".concat(Math.min(100,(temperature-20)/180*100),"%"),background:temperature>100?'linear-gradient(0deg, #ff4444, #ff8844)':'linear-gradient(0deg, #4444ff, #44aaff)'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"temp-value",children:[isHeating?'üî•':'‚ùÑÔ∏è'," ",temperature,"\xB0C"]})]})]});};export default AlchemyFlask;
